{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Phicomm |model=K3 |revision=C (A1/B1/B1G/B2/C1/S1(VIE1)) |series=AC1900 |asin=B075TJ8VNH |fcc_date=07/21/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=YJYK3C |pcb_id=800002313 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |cpu1_model=PXB4583EL;PXB4583EL1600, Intel GRX350, S6533LE6, SLLFB; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0F-SCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GD16EWKG-12H |expansion_if_types=PCIe, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J3,, |wi1_module=Phicomm WLAN-2318 |wi1_module_if=PCIe (non-standard connector, oversize) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |wi1_chip1_model=PSB83523M;Intel, WAV500, S6504L09, SLLQH; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Phicomm WLAN-2318 |wi2_module_if=PCIe (non-standard connector, oversize) |wi2_chip1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |wi2_chip1_model=PSB83513M;Intel, WAV500, S7054L36, SLLVN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4252;Q, 4252, V9E7, V8U4, X4FQ;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo;QPF4519;Q, QPF4519, 5EHD;3; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=PHICOMM_XX, PHICOMM_XX_5G |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |oui=D8:C8:E9 |oui_eth=D8:C8:E9 }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256-QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 MU-MIMO Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.phicomm.com/us/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html Product page] "Intel Innovation" is printed on the outside of the case. :Web GUI: http://p.to The chip IDs are not visible in the FCC photos. :[[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV523 based. Chips generally resemble :the WAV524 visible in the [[ASUS Blue Cave]] FCC photos. ===Model Version=== *Phicomm K3C (A1, C1, S1(VIE1)) - for non-China *Phicomm K3C (B1, B1G, B2) - for China ;(B1/B1G/C1/S1(VIE1)): *"800002313" and "V1.0" is silkscreened on the [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172221fhtj3b3bizeesggb.jpg main board]. *"800002318" and "V1.2" is silkscreened on the [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172221pssszd0n3aae051y.jpg wireless module]. :A single [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172218butjujilgdizk5jr.jpg daughter board] (PCIe x1) contains both Wi-Fi module. ;(A1/B2): *"800002470" and "V1.3" is silkscreened on only one the [https://www.right.com.cn/FORUM/data/attachment/forum/201812/04/200951ubdij0i99o94zz99.jpg main board]. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] [https://ark.intel.com/products/92553/Intel-AnyWAN-GRX350-Network-Processors GRX350] @800MHz Dual Core (MIPS [http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lantiq-announces-carrier-class-network-processing-for-home-gateway-300050735.html interAptiv]) *Wireless chipset: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] [http://www.intel.la/content/dam/www/public/us/en/documents/product-briefs/xway-wi-fi-chipset-wav500-series-brief.pdf WAV500] (PSB83513M/PSB83523M) *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 600Mbps for 2.4GHz, 1300Mbps for 5GHz *PCIe x1 single daughter board ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33190-phicomm-k3c-ac1900-mu-mimo-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Phicomm K3C AC1900 MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://post.smzdm.com/p/556934/ ''Phicomm K3'' on '''smzdm.com'''] *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-120959-1-1.html ''Phicomm K3C (B1)'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (PCB images) :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4583EL1600 - S7013N52 (SLLFB) ([http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201708/14/172222hxmjy3exe3eesdxl.jpg CPU image]) :B2:([https://www.right.com.cn/FORUM/data/attachment/forum/201812/02/213103xvqnqxfds3lxynel.jpg main board])([https://www.right.com.cn/FORUM/data/attachment/forum/201812/02/213104i3qwjqoeq0qhkzob.jpg main board]) ===News=== *[https://newsroom.intel.com/news/intel-advances-home-connectivity-lay-foundation-smart-home/ ''Intel Advances Home Connectivity to Lay
the Foundation for Smart Home'' on '''Intel'''] *[http://blogs.intel.com/iot/2017/05/30/home-connectivity-reimagined/ ''Home Connectivity Reimagined'' on '''Intel'''] ===See also=== *[[Phicomm K3]] - AC3150 Smart Wi-Fi Router (2167+1000Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/121.html PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709 @1.4GHz (Cortex A9), RAM: 512MB :3.5" TFT LCD Display, "800002240" V1.0 PCB (4T4R PA/LNA) *[[Phicomm K3C]] - AC1900 Smart Wi-Fi Router (1300+600Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html PPage] :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4583EL @800MHz (GRX350), RAM: 256MB *[[Phicomm K2]] (PSG1218) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/65.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2C]] (PSG1218) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/73.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2P]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz, RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 64MB *[[Phicomm K2T]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/125.html PPage] *[[Phicomm KE 2P]] - AC1300 Dual Band Gigabit Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/us/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/124.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2 Mini]] (32MB) - N300 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/120.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K1]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/66.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K1S]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/68.html PPage] __NOTOC__
